name: Choosing Your Class in World of Warcraft
task_description: Learn how to select the right class for your playstyle in World of Warcraft and understand the unique abilities and roles each class offers.

objectives.obj_description: Understand the Warrior class - the battlefield veteran with high survivability and melee combat prowess
Explore the Mage class - the master of elemental magic with powerful ranged attacks and crowd control abilities
Learn about the Hunter class - the ranged damage dealer with the ability to tame and command pets
Discover the Paladin class - the holy warrior with the versatility to heal, tank, or deal damage
Comprehend the Rogue class - the stealthy melee assassin with high mobility and burst damage capabilities
Learn the fundamental control, how to play this game?
